author: humbedooh
msg: backport r1379311: Add a notion that, for a skip flag to be used, the rewrite rule has to first match (as per comment #211 on site)

author: humbedooh
msg: backport r1379321: Note that using rewrites with a file-path substitution in a .htaccess file will look for files relative to your document root, not relative to your file system root.

author: humbedooh
msg: backport r1379031: Note that AuthDBDUserRealmQuery is for Digest auth requests, not Basic auth.
